mapper.select: select * from devops_host_app dha where dha.host_id = #{hostId} order by dha.creation_date desc

SELECT dha.id, dha.project_id, dha.host_id, dha.name, dha.code, dha.operation_type, dha.rdupm_type, dha.object_version_number, dha.created_by, dha.creation_date, dha.last_updated_by, dha.last_update_date, dha.effect_value_id, dhai.pre_command, dhai.run_command, dhai.post_command, dhai.kill_command, dhai.health_prob, dh.name AS host_name FROM devops_host_app dha JOIN devops_host dh ON dh.id = dha.host_id LEFT JOIN devops_host_app_instance dhai ON dhai.app_id = dha.id WHERE dha.id = #{id}
